overview: Volume 15 includes 6 new adult films, featuring a polyamorous love story in a dystopian country, a sexy lunch break in a moving truck, an old flame between ex-lovers that refuses to die, an orgy in a bike shop and much more. Along with two new movies directed by Erika Lust we have four guest directors showcasing their vision of eroticism and sensuality, shot around the globe, from Barcelona to Florianópolis in Brasil! Included: Speedos Cleptomaniac; A Mundança; The Bike Club; Men in Kilts; An Illicit Affair; Valentin Pierre & Catalina.
title: XConfessions 15
